name: The Space Program
description:
Welcome to the Space Program! Your mission is to collect as many stars as you can and return to earth! Be careful, space is littered with dangers like black holes, white holes, and space junk! Pilot your craft through the dangers of space, collect the stars, and get home before you run out of fuel.

- 90 FREE levels!
- Variety of space dangers
- Levels vary in difficulty
- Play it your way! Play the levels in any order you want!
